name: BaggieLayout
short_description: BaggieLayout is a Java swing LayoutManager, as powerful as GridBagLayout, but VERY easy to use. Use simple XML or JavaBean constraints for positioning. Unlike other LayoutManagers, obeys min/max/pref sizes, & components don't jump/dissapear when resized
